thread.title: Jackpot! Area resident wins $1 million in lottery
thread.title_full: Jackpot! Area resident wins $1 million in lottery

author: epoole@ellwoodcityledger.com(Eric Poole)
title: Jackpot! Area resident wins $1 million in lottery
text:
Jackpot! Area resident wins $1 million in lottery Eric Poole epoole@ellwoodcityledger.com   0 comments 
FRANKLIN TWP. -- An Ellwood City-area resident won $1 million on a Pennsylvania Lottery scratch-off ticket bought at the Giant Eagle in Franklin Plaza -- but for now the winner is keeping a low profile. 
A spokesman for the Pennsylvania Lottery confirmed the purchase of the winning $1 Million Super Cash ticket last month at Mario's Giant Eagle. The winner declined to comment when contacted at home by The Ledger. 
The Super Cash scratch-off game costs $20. The card has six winning numbers and 20 numbers for play. If any of the play numbers matches any of the winning numbers, the player wins the prize indicated beneath the matched number, up to a $1 million grand prize.
